BBjGridExWidget

Class BBjGridExWidget

  • java.lang.Object
    • BBjWidget
      • BBjGridExWidget.BBjGridExWidget

  • public class BBjGridExWidget
extends BBjWidget
    The Grid Core Class.This class works as a columns manager and api provider. It contains a big number of methods and properties to configure the column from A..Z. Every property and method has one or more tag attached. The following is the meanging for each tag :

     Enterprise The property/method is used only with the enterprise version· using it without having a valid license will
    be ignored·
     Configuration Properties and methods which are tagged with this tag are used to configure the grid before it is rendered on the client·
    Changing these properties or calling these methods won't affect the grid which is displayed on the client·
    In order to reflect your changes on the client, you need to rerender the whole grid
    or rerender the column definition once again·
     API Methods/properties tagged with this tag can be called before or after the grid is rendered on the client and they don't require a refresh·
     ColumnsRerender Changing this property or calling this method after the first render require columns rerender using updateColumns() method
     GridRerender Changing this property or calling this method after the first render require full rerender using render() method
    Author:
    Stephan Wald, Hyyan Abo Fakher

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      DataRow AttributesRecord!
      An attribute record which can be used to override the column's attributes fetched from the resultset or applied using the api methods· This field is honored only when setData() method is called

      Columns Manager instance

      When true enable debug mode , disable otherwise

      The Grid enterprise key

      Instance of the grid options class
      BBjString RowNodeId$
      The unique string to use as row inedx· defualt is __ROW_INDEX

      The resultset instance

      #API
      void setRowsData(ResultSet rs!)
      Feed the grid with a new rows set Unlike the setData method, this one will update the grid with a new rows set(ResultSet) without doing a full rerender· The column defintion will not be synced from the passed ResultSet in this case· Use this method in case you want to replace the whole data in the grid at once·

      • addColumnGroup

        public BBjGridExWidgetColumnGroup addColumnGroup(BBjString id!,
BBjString label!,
BBjVector columns!,
BBjNumber marryChildren!,
BBjString headerClass!)
        Add column group
        #Configuration
        #ColumnsRerender
        Parameters:
        BBjString - id! The group id
        BBjString - label! The group label/name
        BBjVector - columns! Vector of columns ids/fields to use
        BBjNumber - marryChildren! Set to 'true' to keep columns in this group beside each other in the grid. Moving the columns outside of the group (and hence breaking the group) is not allowed.
        BBjString - headerClass! A CSS class to apply
        Returns:
        BBjGridExWidgetColumnGroup The BBjGridExWidgetColumnGroup instance

      • addColumnGroup

        Parameters:

        BBjVector - columns! Vector of columns ids/fields to use
        BBjNumber - marryChildren! Set to 'true' to keep columns in this group beside each other in the grid. Moving the columns outside of the group (and hence breaking the group) is not allowed.
        Returns:
        BBjGridExWidgetColumnGroup The BBjGridExWidgetColumnGroup instance

      • render

        public void render()
        Render the grid The method will compose the grid config and send it to the client for a full rerender. You can use this method to force the client render after you update a setup configuration (ex: column defintions)

      • updateColumns

        public void updateColumns()
        Rerender the column defintions on the client.
        #API The method will collect the new changes in columns and column groups and force the client to reflect the change.

        public void buildColumnsFromResultSet(ResultSet rs!,

        Build the column defintions from the passed resultset
        Parameters:

        BBjNumber - addAll! When true , We will create a column defintion for every column in the resultset , otherwise update the existing ones only

      • setRowsData

        public void setRowsData(ResultSet rs!)
        Feed the grid with a new rows set Unlike the setData method, this one will update the grid with a new rows set(ResultSet) without doing a full rerender· The column defintion will not be synced from the passed ResultSet in this case· Use this method in case you want to replace the whole data in the grid at once·
        #API
        Parameters:
        ResultSet - rs! ResultSet with the data
        See Also:
        setData()

        Returns:
        BBjNumber 1 when pivot mode is enabled , 0 otherwise

      • setFunctionsReadOnly

        public void setFunctionsReadOnly(BBjNumber readonly!)
        If true, then row group, pivot and value aggregation will be read only from the Ui· The grid will display what values are used for each, but will not allow the use to change the selection
        #Enterprise
        #Configuration
        #API
        Parameters:
        BBjNumber - readonly! when true disable , enable otherwise
